confidence_tiers._note: Relative tiers based on RANK, not raw score (Netflix/YouTube approach)

Peer_Bundle.subject: Partnership Opportunity - {name}
Peer_Bundle.body:
Hi {name},

I noticed we're both focused on {niche} and thought there could be a great collaboration opportunity.

I specialize in {my_offering} and I'm looking for {my_need}.

Your work with {audience} really resonates with me. Would you be open to a quick 15-min call?

Best,
{my_name}

Referral_Upstream.subject: Potential Referral Partnership
Referral_Upstream.body:
Hi {name},

I work with clients who often need support BEFORE they're ready for my services in {niche}.

Your expertise in {their_offering} makes you a perfect upstream partner. I'd love to explore sending referrals your way.

Could we connect?

Best,
{my_name}

Referral_Downstream.subject: Referral Opportunity
Referral_Downstream.body:
Hi {name},

After my clients finish working with me on {my_offering}, they often need exactly what you offer ({their_offering}).

I think we could create a great referral flow.

Interested in a quick call?

Best,
{my_name}

Service_Provider.subject: Service Inquiry
Service_Provider.body:
Hi {name},

I'm {my_name} and I'm looking for support with {my_need}.

Your expertise in {their_offering} caught my attention. Do you have 15 minutes this week for a quick intro call?

Best,
{my_name}
